FARCASTER_DRY_RUN.description: Expected boolean value to enable or disable dry run mode.

FARCASTER_FID.description: Farcaster fid is required and must be an integer greater than 0.

MAX_CAST_LENGTH.description: Maximum length of a cast, must be an integer.

FARCASTER_POLL_INTERVAL.description: Interval for polling in minutes, must be an integer.

ENABLE_POST.description: Expected boolean value to enable or disable posting.

POST_INTERVAL_MIN.description: Minimum interval between posts in minutes, must be an integer.

POST_INTERVAL_MAX.description: Maximum interval between posts in minutes, must be an integer.

ENABLE_ACTION_PROCESSING.description: Expected boolean value to enable or disable action processing.

ACTION_INTERVAL.description: Interval for action processing in minutes, must be an integer.

POST_IMMEDIATELY.description: Expected boolean value to enable or disable immediate posting.

MAX_ACTIONS_PROCESSING.description: Maximum number of actions to process, must be an integer.

ACTION_TIMELINE_TYPE.description: Type of action timeline, must match an ActionTimelineType enum value.
